Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We are given a description of a process and we need to model it as a POWL Partially Ordered Workflow Language model. Steps 1 Identify the activities and create Transition objects for them except silent ones which are SilentTransition 2 Identify the controlflow structures loops and exclusive choices 3 Identify the partial orders concurrent and sequential constraints

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Lets break down the process 1 Start with verifying the Service Request SR and then Contract Setup CS must be done So we have SR CS 2 After CS two tasks can be done in parallel Datacenter Allocation DA and Access Control Initialization ACI 3 Then after both DA and ACI are done we have a loop The loop is between Base Network Configuration BNC and Debug Reconfigure DR The loop structure is BNC followed by optional DR repeats until stable 4 After the loop we have an exclusive choice between Containerized Deployment CD and Monolithic Deployment MD 5 After the deployment we have two tasks Quality Assurance QA and Security Audit SA that can be done concurrently both before GoLive Approval GLA 6 Finally after QA and SA both done GLA
